translation: Presiding over the ears, eyes, touch, taste, smell, and mind, it enjoys the objects of the senses.
commentary: 15.9 Shrotram the ear? The eye the eye? touch the (organ of) touch? f and? Rasanam the (organ of) taste? smell the (organ of) smell? Eve even? f and? presiding over the presiding over? The mind the mind? f and? Ayam this (soul)? objects of the senses? Upasevate enjoys.Commentary Here is a description of how the subtle body remaining in the gross body enjoys the objects of the senses.The individual soul
